CustomField.description: This field is optional and can be collected as part of a workflow. It specifies the manner in which the distribution should be made. (The 'periodic RMD as calculated' option should only be selected for plans and circumstances where the required minimum distribution calculation applies, subject to financial institution policy.)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specifies the manner in which the distribution should be made.
CustomField.label: Distribution Payment Type

value.fullName: Periodic RMD as calculated (Traditional or SIMPLE only)
value.label: Periodic RMD as calculated (Traditional or SIMPLE only)
